description: The Outdoors Is All Yours. A collaborative design with artist and outdoor inclusivity activist, DJ Javier, this heavyweight T-shirt is a reminder that the outdoors is yours for the taking, no matter where you live, where you're from, or where you're headed. Mixing aspects of local, street, and outdoor culture, this sweatshirt symbolizes our collective commitment to making the outdoors a more welcoming and approachable space for all people to learn, explore, and enjoy. Whether you're a first timer at the crag, a seasoned peak chaser, or a weekend camping warrior, this tee will keep you cozy for the warm up and the wind down.
name: Marmot DJ Javier Heavyweight Tee SS - Mens
